webscript.description:
Get an RM Constraint including the details. The list name is qualified with an underscore between prefix and name to be compatible with Java Script and URLs e.g. rma_listName rather than rma:listName
Constraint object
constraintName
the name of the constraint. The underscore character is used instead of the colon
constraintDetails
array of constraint details

constraintDetails object
authorityName
the full name of the authority, either user or group
values
array of constraint values

Example JSON data 
 
  "data":
        {
           "constraintName" : "rma_smList",
           "constraintDetails" : [
{
     "authorityName" : "fbloggs",
     "values" : [ "NOFORN", "FGI" ] 
   }
